channel.title: Football at the George & Dragon
channel.description: Keep track of O'Reilly books as they're announced

item.title: Error scraping this feed
item.description:
Unable to finish scraping this webpage into a feed. Please get the person in charge of maintaining the scraped feed (not the person in charge of the original website) to fix this.

Stack trace:

  File "/home/.harvard/bsharon/footyrss/ScrapeNFeed.py", line 84, in refresh
    self.HTML2RSS(headers, body)

  File "test.py", line 13, in HTML2RSS
    for row in table('tr'):
'NoneType' object is not callable
